snippet: Syrian activists working to show what the government crackdown on dissent looks like have found video clips apparently recorded as souvenirs by members of Mr. Assad's security forces.
abstract: Syrian activists working to show what the government crackdown on dissent looks like have found video clips apparently recorded as souvenirs by members of Mr. Assad's security forces.

headline.main: Assad's Forces Record Brutal Crackdown as They Carry It Out
